articles.author: John Hudson
articles.title: Biden’s strategy of pessimism ekes out progress with Putin - The Washington Post
articles.description: Modest technocratic gains stand in contrast to the grander ambitions of previous American presidents in meetings with the Russian leader.
articles.content:
He would make no overtures for a reset in relations, and his pessimism about the prospects of changing Putins mind on issues such as human rights would inform his actions.
